00068 //=============================================================================
00069 //Globals
00070 //=============================================================================
00072 static sig_atomic_t gInterruptRequested = 0;
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 //=============================================================================
00078 //Function definitions
00079 //=============================================================================
00080 static void signalHandler(int signalNumber) {
00081   gInterruptRequested = 1;
00082 }
00083 //=============================================================================
00084 static bool printUsage(std::string nodeName, int argc, char** argv) {
00085   //Check for "-h" or "--help", if found, print usage
00086   for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00087     if ((0 == strcmp(argv[i], "-h")) || (0 == strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))) {
00088       printf("\n");
00089       printf("Usage:\n");
00090       printf("    %s [params]\n", nodeName.c_str());
00091       printf("\n");
00092       printf("Parameters and their default values\n");
00093       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00094              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,
00095              (nodeName + "/" + teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC).c_str());
00096       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00097              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TYPE,
00098              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TYPE);
00099       printf("    _%s:=%d\n",
00100              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_LISTEN_TIMEOUT,
00101              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_LISTEN_TIMEOUT);
00102       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00103              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE,
00104              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE);
00105       printf("    _%s:=%d\n",
00106              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_KEYBOARD_STEPS,
00107              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_KEYBOARD_STEPS);
00108       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00109              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_JOYSTICK_DEVICE,
00110              teleop::TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_JOYSTICK_DEVICE);
00111       printf("\n");
00112       return true;
00113     }
00114   }
00115   return false;
00116 }
00117 //=============================================================================
00118 
00119 
00120 
00121 
00122 //=============================================================================
00123 //Main
00124 //=============================================================================
00125 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00126   //Use first argument (executable name) as node name
00127   std::string nodeName(basename(argv[0]));
00128 
00129   //Check if we should just print usage information and quit
00130   if (printUsage(nodeName, argc, argv)) {
00131     return 0;
00132   }
00133 
00134   //Set SIGINT signal handler
00135   signal(SIGINT, signalHandler);
00136 
00137   //Create the node object
00138   teleop::TeleopSourceNode node;
00139 
00140   //Init node object
00141   if (!node.init(argc, argv, nodeName, ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler)) {
00142     ROS_ERROR("main: error initialising node");
00143     return 1;
00144   }
00145 
00146   //Periodically check for interruption
00147   while (0 == gInterruptRequested) {
00148     boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(500));
00149   }
00150 
00151   //Done
00152   return 0;
00153 }
